message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product holds immense value for you, worth $10,000, and it's tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I would like to propose a special introductory price of $9,500 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire this high-quality item at a reduced cost. Please let me know if this proposal suits your budget and preferences. Looking forward to your positive response.
